description: Magic? That I did. The body and mind is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural. Most are ignorant about the existence of magic in this world, but given you recognize the methods of activation, power will be at your fingertips. Magic based off the colors of the world or magic --fueled-- by the potential energy stored deep within shards of amethyst; Using mana to transmute and create or take control of one's soul and near total invincibility.
